item.description:
Hello Everyone,

I want to invite you to a seminar being given by Father Peter Bowes. Father Peter is the co-director of the Order of Christ-Sophia and is a Master Teacher in every sense. Every time I attend one of his seminars I learn something about myself, I learn how to live more peacefully, and feel the joy of being in the presence of a Teacher who is truly loving.

If you would like to learn more about him, or hear some of his previous talks, please visit his website at http://www.askfatherp.... Give yourself a tremendous gift and come join us.

Peace be with you,
Shakur

Allowing Yourself to be Healed
The process of healing includes asking for what you want in your life and having the courage to open to receive it. Receiving is sometimes hard because in the past we have been hurt or rejected. The process of healing requires a belief that things can be as you want them to be. Having a relationship with Divine Unconditional Love naturally lifts the burdens of your pain and heals the wounds of your heart.
item.name: Seminar: Allowing Yourself to be Healed
